comment_body: Nice! What did the demon look like in your mind while you wrote this?
Great story! I'd like to believe that Rex is a German Shepherd or one of those big breeds... But imagine if Rex was a chihuahua?
Oh like an evil little goblin out of Tolkien, I guess, nothing wildly unusual ðŸ˜ˆðŸ˜ˆ

Oh that would be a nice touch! I imagined him also as a big gold and black German Shepard sort of dog (probably recollections of an old detective show I used to watch with a crime-solving big police dog).
But a little poodle would be so funny!!!
